snippet: The latest case seeks to block federal payments that keep cost-sharing low for the poor. The harm could be significant.
abstract: Editorial opposes suit filed by House Republican opponents of Affordable Care Act aimed at blocking federal payments to health insurance companies to keep deductibles, co-payments and other cost-sharing low for the poor; says that if suit is successful, companies may raise premiums to recoup loss.
lead_paragraph: The latest case seeks to block federal payments that keep cost-sharing low for the poor. The harm could be significant.

headline.main: Another Baseless Attack on Health Law
headline.print_headline: Another Baseless Attack on Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
